DOC.brief_summary: The aim study assess impact intervention improve parenting practice , pre-academic developmental skill , use mosquito net child kindergarten Liberia . A rigorous impact evaluation use randomize , waitlist control design conduct measure impact intervention three primary outcome : positive parenting skill , child 's cognitive educational skill , malaria knowledge prevention behavior .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Parenting Program Liberia Improve Parenting , Education , Health Outcomes Children Liberia
DOC.criteria: Parents primary caregiver ( age 18 ) child age 37 enrolled kindergarten Resident one five study site Severe cognitive disability caregiver affect ability provide inform consent
